author: abrinke1
body:
Part 3 of a series of PRs from @jiafulow (following #22820 and #22839 ) which will bring the EMTF emulator up-to-date for 2018 running. This PR includes configurable modifications to the EMTF track-building sequence which reduce the rate without efficiency loss, especially in high-pileup conditions.  Details as follows:

Best regards,
Andrew
title: EMTF April 2018 emulator update part 3 - track-building for 2018
